name: NBA Give 'n Go
overview: No Quarters Required... We took all the action from our arcade classic and stuffed it with new features. Then we added some more. And more. - Official NBA license (What's a game of hoops without the biggest names on the court?) - Play one game, a whole, or just the Playoffs. And set the teams up the way YOU want. - Up to four people an play. Hey, it's a team sport. - You liked the arcade version cuz there were no rules. Cool, now you can play the arcade game at home. - You didn't like the arcade version cuz there were no rules. Cool, we added realistic play for the home.
